statements: UPDATE InvestmentPortfolio SET current_value = 1500, total_investment = purchase_price * quantity WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE InvestmentPortfolio SET quantity = 100, purchase_price = 25.50 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE InvestmentPortfolio SET current_value = current_value * 1.1, total_investment = purchase_price * quantity WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE InvestmentPortfolio SET purchase_price = 1250.75, quantity = 50, total_investment = 1250.75 * 50 WHERE asset_name = 'Tech Stocks';
UPDATE portfolio_data SET purchase_price = 1000.50, shares_owned = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET return_on_investment = 0.08, volatility = 0.05, sharpe_ratio = 1.25 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE portfolio_data SET shares_owned = shares_owned + 100, purchase_price = 1500.56 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE performance_metrics SET return_on_investment = 7.85, volatility = 2.34, sharpe_ratio = 1.23 WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE Portfolio SET total_value = 15000.00 WHERE portfolio_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE Investment SET investment_value = 5000.00, investment_type = 'Stocks' WHERE investment_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c9';
UPDATE Portfolio SET total_value = total_value + 10000 WHERE portfolio_id = '9f4ca446-73a7-4fc5-b3e3-ccc8300b83d2';
UPDATE Investment SET investment_value = 5000, investment_name = 'New Investment' WHERE investment_id = 'b5cd1f6b-8c12-434b-8a62-20d3751e77ae';
UPDATE Portfolio_Information SET investment_firm = 'New Investment Firm' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Holdings SET cost_basis = 50.25, number_of_shares = 1000 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Portfolio_Information SET investment_firm = 'Goldman Sachs' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Holdings SET cost_basis = 1500, number_of_shares = 1000 WHERE portfolio_id = 3;
UPDATE portfolios SET total_value = 15000.50 WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE holdings SET quantity = 50.3, cost_price = 75.25 WHERE holding_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE portfolios SET total_value = total_value + 1000 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE holdings SET quantity = quantity - 10, cost_price = cost_price * 1.05 WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' AND purchase_date <= '2022-02-01';
